001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009
010import dev.failsafe.Failsafe;
011import dev.failsafe.FailsafeExecutor;
012import dev.failsafe.RetryPolicy;
013import dev.failsafe.event.ExecutionAttemptedEvent;
014
015import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
016import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonException;
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
018
019import org.slf4j.Logger;
020import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
021
022/**
023 * Implementation for a retry of a requests upon configured response status codes
024 */
025public class RetryMiddleware implements RetryRequestMiddleware, AutoCloseable {
026    static final String loggerName = ClientBuilder.COMMERCETOOLS + ".retry";
027
028    /**
029     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY} instead
030     */
031    @Deprecated
032    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY = RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY;
033    /**
034     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY} instead
035     */
036    @Deprecated
037    public static final int DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY = RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY;
038    /**
039     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES} instead
040     */
041    @Deprecated
042    public static final List<Integer> DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES = RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES;
043    private static final InternalLogger logger = InternalLogger.getLogger(loggerName);
044    private static final Logger classLogger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RetryMiddleware.class);
045
046    private final FailsafeExecutor<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> failsafeExecutor;
047
048    /**
049     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int)} instead
050     */
051    @Deprecated
052    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
053        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
054            RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int, List)} instead
059     */
060    @Deprecated
061    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
062        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
063            statusCodes, null);
064    }
065
066    RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes,
067            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
068        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
069            statusCodes, failures);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int, long, long)} instead
074     */
075    @Deprecated
076    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
077        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * @deprecated use {@link RetryRequestMiddleware#of(int, long, long, List)} instead
082     */
083    @Deprecated
084    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
085            final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
086        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, statusCodes, null);
087    }
088
089    RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay, final List<Integer> statusCodes,
090            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
091        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
092                .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes)));
093    }
094
095    RetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
096            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
097        RetryPolicy<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> retryPolicy = fn
098                .apply(RetryPolicy.<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> builder()
099                        .withBackoff(delay, maxDelay, ChronoUnit.MILLIS)
100                        .withJitter(0.25)
101                        .withMaxRetries(maxRetries)
102                        .onRetry(this::logEventFailure))
103                .build();
104        this.failsafeExecutor = Failsafe.with(retryPolicy);
105    }
106
107    private void logEventFailure(ExecutionAttemptedEvent<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> event) {
108        final int attempt = event.getAttemptCount();
109
110        logger.info(() -> "Retry #" + attempt);
111        logger.trace(() -> {
112            final Throwable failure = event.getLastFailure();
113            if (failure instanceof ApiHttpException) {
114                final ApiHttpException httpException = (ApiHttpException) failure;
115                final ApiHttpRequest request = httpException.getRequest();
116                final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response = httpException.getResponse();
117                if (request != null) {
118                    return requestLog(attempt, request, response);
119                }
120            }
121            return event.toString();
122        });
123    }
124
125    private String requestLog(final int attempt, ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<?> response) {
126        String output;
127        final String httpMethodAndUrl = request.getMethod().name() + " " + request.getUrl().toString();
128        if (request.getBody() != null) {
129            final String unformattedBody = request.getSecuredBody();
130            final boolean isJsonRequest = request.getHeaders()
131                    .getHeaders(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)
132                    .stream()
133                    .findFirst()
134                    .map(ct -> ct.getValue().toLowerCase().contains("json"))
135                    .orElse(true);
136            if (isJsonRequest) {
137                String prettyPrint;
138                try {
139                    prettyPrint = JsonUtils.prettyPrint(unformattedBody);
140                }
141                catch (final JsonException e) {
142                    classLogger.warn("pretty print failed", e);
143                    prettyPrint = unformattedBody;
144                }
145                output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl + "\nformatted: " + prettyPrint;
146            }
147            else {
148                output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + request.getMethod().name() + " "
149                        + request.getUrl() + " " + unformattedBody;
150            }
151        }
152        else {
153            output = "Retry #" + attempt + ": " + request + "\n" + httpMethodAndUrl + " <no body>";
154        }
155        if (response != null) {
156            output += "\nFailure response: " + response.getStatusCode() + "\n" + response + "\n"
157                    + Optional.ofNullable(response.getBody())
158                            .map(body -> JsonUtils.prettyPrint(response.getBodyAsString().orElse("")))
159                            .orElse("<no body>");
160        }
161        return output;
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
166     */
167    @Deprecated
168    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries) {
169        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
170            RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
171    }
172
173    /**
174     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
175     */
176    @Deprecated
177    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final List<Integer> statusCodes) {
178        this(maxRetries, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_MAX_DELAY,
179            statusCodes, null);
180    }
181
182    /**
183     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
184     */
185    @Deprecated
186    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay) {
187        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.DEFAULT_RETRY_STATUS_CODES, null);
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * @deprecated max parallel requests are limited by underlying HTTP client
192     */
193    @Deprecated
194    public RetryMiddleware(final int maxParallelRequests, final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
195            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
196        this(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, statusCodes, null);
197    }
198
199    @Override
200    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(final ApiHttpRequest request,
201            final Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> next) {
202        return failsafeExecutor.getStageAsync(() -> next.apply(request));
203    }
204
205    @Override
206    public void close() {
207    }
208}
